name: Light and Dark Run
description:
Runner game where you must light torches before it gets too dark. If you reach the end, you must snuff out all the torches on the reverse path. Made for Mini Jam 61. The theme was Ancient Egypt and the limitation was the game must be themed around two conflicting ideas.

Controls:

[A] Decelerate slightly.

[SPACE] Jump. Long press for a higher jump.

[D] Start.
